name: Vimo Foods
overview:
Established in the year 2010, we, “Vimo Foods Pvt. Ltd.”, are one of the trusted and reliable wholesalers of supreme quality Fruits. Our range includes quality-assured Pomegranate, Banana, Strawberry, Dates, Grapes, Custardapple, Apple and Dev Mango.

CEO Message: In current market many fruits are ripen by using various chemicals, which are hazardous for health. Fruits like Mango and Banana in our company are ripening by using scientific method and other fruits ripen naturally. Customer is god for us that’s why Fulfilling customer need is our main motto.

Our Team: Procuring agents Quality controllers Ripening agents Warehousing and packaging personnel

Vendor Base: We offer to our customers, the best-in-class range of fruits procured from some of the efficient and trusted farmers who have been engaged with our organization for over a very long time. These farmers use supreme quality seeds, manure and fertilizers in order to grow these fruits and provide them to us.

Clientele: Vividham Sweets & Dry Fruits Shreeji Dry Fruits Royal Dry Fruits Jitenra Stores Regal Plus Alfa Anand Foodland Trupti Dry Fruits

Client Satisfaction: Since the time of establishment, we are offering to our customers, a wide and exclusive range of Fruits. Procured from some of the most trusted and reliable farmers, these fruits have a high nutritional value and content. Moreover, this range of fruits has been widely appreciated by our clients for their unmatched taste and freshness.
